page.title: 03ROSSENDALE FREEPRESS
page.content: Saturday 8th June. The idea of{children }planting their own {gardens}in areas of public parks and spare land, to keep parks tidy. Young children have been drinking from the river which has been polluted. No job losses and no service cutbacks have been promised by the council transport department even though it must make savings of Â£100,000 next year. The{traditional}village wood carver has returned to Waterfoot.A man who was made redundant, he has decided to turn his hobby of woodturning into a busness.He will make anything in wood to a customer's requirments.
